name: Pacific Liberation Force
description: Defeat El Presidente with an aerial onslaught!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98, XP, Vista, Windows 7 Processor: 1.8 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon 8500, Nvidia GeForce 3 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews.review_text: The story is not very original at all, flight physics are awful and you only get about an hour of gameplay out of this game. I found it to be unplayable with a joystick because there are no dead zone settings and the helicopter is extremely twitchy (at least with my joystick).
